changeSet.sql:
update episode set clinic = currentclinic from (select e.id as id, patient.clinic as currentclinic from (select patient, max(index) as maxindex from episode group by patient) as x inner join episode as e on e.patient = x.patient and e.index = x.maxindex right join patient on patient.id = e.patient) as ep where episode.id = ep.id;
update episode set clinic = (select id from clinic where mainclinic = 't') where episode.clinic is null;

changeSet.sql:
update package pack set clinic = currentclinic from (select pre.clinic as currentclinic, pack.id as pid from prescription pre, package pack where pack.prescription = pre.id group by pid, currentclinic order by currentclinic, pid) as foo where pack.id = foo.pid;
update package pack set clinic = (select clinic.id from clinic where mainclinic = true) where pack.clinic is null;

changeSet.sql: update package pack set clinic = c.ep_clinic from (select packageId, id, prescription, clinic as pack_clinic, packdate from package pack where prescription is not null ) as a left outer join (select id as pid, patient from prescription pre ) as b on a.prescription = b.pid left outer join (select patient as pat, startdate, stopdate, clinic as ep_clinic from episode ep) as c on c.pat = b.patient where a.prescription is not null and a.pack_clinic != c.ep_clinic and (a.packdate between c.startdate and c.stopdate or (a.packdate > c.startdate and c.stopdate is null)) and pack.id = a.id;
